name: Missed Connection (daidiimon, alwayssami)
description:
Made by Imon, Hunter, Sarah, and Yiran for College Game Jam!

Controls:

Escape - Exit Game

Scene

LClick - Interact

RClick - First Person

WASD - Move

Conversation

Mouse - Look

LClick - Dialogue Select

Enter - Skip to branch/end

Instructions:

This game follows two characters through a number of "scenes". During scenes, you can enter First Person view and interact with a memory to trigger a "conversation".

In conversation, you can make choices that will have impacts on future conversations and scenes.

There are 3 types of conversations: blue, red, and green.

Blue are normal, Reds are key events to unlock the single Green event, which is the true ending.

There are 8 Reds total, but remember, your choices matter too!

Credits:

Imon - Programmer, Narrative Designer/Writer

Hunter - Level/Environment Design

Sarah - Character Modeler/Designer

Yiran - Musician

Animations from Mixamo

Environment textures from Unreal Engine's Starter Content

idk who the VAs are but the voices are Dimitri and Marth from Fire Emblem Heroes lol
